Literature.Title: De novo-designed amphiphilic α-helical peptide Z2 exhibits broad-spectrum antimicrobial, anti-biofilm, and anti-inflammatory efficacy in acute Pseudomonas aeruginosa pneumonia
Literature.Author: Zhang MY, Li S, Han YL, Shi YF, Wu YY, Cheng J, Wang CY, Zhou XY, Zhang YX

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 9637(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli SYP-B3820(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli SYP-B4288(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli SYP-B4289(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii SYP-B4290(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii SYP-B4291(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii SYP-B3819(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae CMCC 46117(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>64µg/ml)
